conbody.p: Before you begin, do/verify the following:

ul.li: Configure JAVA_HOME in your system environment variables
Install Git Runtime: https://git-scm.com/download/winWhen installing the git runtime, select "Use Git from the Windows Command Prompt".
Add Git to your system path environment variable
Fork the DITA-OT docs repo, and github repo for the workshop: https://github.com/dita-ot/docs and https://github.com/irruka/applied-magic
